data.title: Top 5 Best Residential Projects In Dombivali 2024
data.meta_description: Dombivali is one of the finest localities with World-class education, business centres and more. Here are best residential projects in Dombivali for your assistance.
data.meta_site_name: Latest Property News & Blog Articles | HomeBazaar.com
data.text:
Dombivali is one of the finest localities with World-class education, high-end marketplaces, business centres, multi-speciality health centres, excellent connectivity, and large-scale infrastructural development and is all on-site conveniences. The real estate market in Dombivli is growing due to all the above aspects and the demand for the housing sector is also rising. Check out the article here we have researched the best residential projects in Dombivali for your assistance.

Best Residential Projects in Dombivali 2024

Dombivali is a city which is one of the known metropolitan regions in Mumbai. It is also the second-most skilled town in India and the first educational town in Maharashtra.

The Mumbai Metropolitan Region is one of the urban centres. About 30 kilometres separate it from Mumbai.

Dombivali is divided into Dombivali East and Dombivali West sides, with a railway connecting the city with central railways via Vasai Road or Western Railway which is 5 min away distance from the local Dombivali station.

The most developed area of the city is Dombivli (East), which features broad streets, a more commercial outlook, and Industrial and Residential Areas.

Swapnil Kamat, the Homebazaar.com expert from Thane, said,” Dombivali’s real estate stage is set, with the spotlight on demand growth and the availability of affordable housing stealing the show. As more residential projects develop in this locality, so does the accessibility to homes that not only fulfil dreams but also bridge the gap between aspiration and affordability. With rising property prices this is the right time to invest in Dombivali.”

As the city is developing to become a mega city the housing demand is also growing, and people are looking for properties to invest in this area.

Here are the best residential projects in Dombivali, even if you are an end-user or investor this list will help you out.

Lodha Codename Premier

One of India’s leading developers Lodha Group is building a residential project in Dombivali – Lodha Casa Premier, which is one of the best residential projects in the Dombivali region.

The project is beautifully designed and spread across 50 acres of land parcel. It offers all the magnificent amenities to provide the luxury and comfort of living here.

The project will be handed over in the year 2025.

Why Lodha Casa Premier

Premium finishing homes with extra luxurious amenities and a large sundeck.

10 min proximity to the railway station and metro station just outside of the project.

A large lakeside park with stunning amenities.

24/7 multi-tier security system.

Connectivity

The project is located in the Dombivali East region having proximity to the Dombivali station and metro station. Kalyan-shilphata roadways, Manpada Road, and Diva Mahape Road provide excellent connectivity.

Property Rates in Lodha Casa Premier and Unit Size

Type Carpet Area Price 1 BHK 444 sq. ft ₹ 45.59 L 1 BHK 479 sq. ft ₹ 48.59 L 2 BHK 540 sq. ft ₹ 58.99 L 2 BHK 572 sq. ft ₹ 61.99 L 3 BHK 759 sq. ft ₹ 82.99 L

Runwal Gardens

Runwal Gardens by Gunwal group is a thoughtfully designed and planned township project in Dombivali spread out over 115 acres of land having 23 towers in the project.

The project is designed to transform the way you will live. It has a sprawling magnificent number of amenities in the lap of nature with sports, fun and activities making it one of the best residential projects in Dombivali.

Why Runwal Gardens

14 spectacular Gardens with more than 1800 trees

Reputed schools and marketplaces are within the township.

Metro line Kalyan Taloja is nearby.

3-level huge clubhouse with 100+ amenities.

Connectivity

The project is Located near the intersection of Navi Mumbai, Thane, and Kalyan’s business hubs which have metro connectivity and roadways connecting to Thane.

Property Rates in Runwal Gardens and Unit Size

Type Carpet Area Price 1 BHK 454 sq. ft ₹ 48.49 L 1 BHK 435 sq. ft ₹ 44.31 L 1 BHK 346 sq. ft ₹ 36.22 L 2 BHK 614 sq. ft ₹ 65.12 L 2 BHK 674 sq. ft ₹ 72.40 L 2 BHK 549 sq. ft ₹ 59.46 L 3 BHK 724 sq. ft ₹ 77.51 L 3 BHK 803 sq. ft ₹ 88.55 L 3 BHK 999 sq. ft ₹ 1.04 Cr

Sai World Dreams

The project Sai World Dreams is one of the best residential projects in Dombivali by the Paradise Group set across 18 acres of land. The project offers excellent connectivity with extraordinary lifestyle amenities to give you a quality living experience.

The project will be completed in the year 2028.

Why Sai World Dreams

G+ 3-storey retail mall on the Premises

Integrated development with hospitality and business centres.

Marvellous designed landscape gardens

Video security and surveillance for each apartment.

Connectivity

The project is located on the East side of Dombivali having excellent connectivity options via Railways, metro and roadways to the Thane and Navi Mumbai areas.

Property Rates in Sai World Dreams and Unit Size

Type Carpet Area Price 1 BHK 450 sq. ft ₹ 47.00 L 1 BHK 711 sq. ft ₹ 73.50 L 2 BHK 720 sq. ft ₹ 74.50 L 2.5 BHK 825 sq. ft ₹ 85.00 L 3 BHK 1194 sq. ft ₹ 1.22 Cr 3 BHK 1313 sq. ft ₹ 1.35 Cr

Marathon Nexworld

The project Marathon Nexworld is a beautifully designed and constructed township project featuring stunning spacious apartments and one of the best residential projects in Dombivali.

The project is spread across 25 acres of land having 2 towers. It has incredible amenities with stunning skyscrapers and green areas to give you a better lifestyle and comfort in living in this township. The possession of apartments is from 2023 onwards.

Why Marathon Nexworld

Affordable homes with world-class amenities in the project.

Large windows for panoramic views and good ventilation in homes.

Skyscraping amenities with 40+ other amenities to match every age group.

Excellent connectivity is available from the project via. Roadway and Railway.

Connectivity

The project is situated at Dombivali East, offering proximity to the Metro station and Dombivali station. Roadways offer connectivity to other parts of the city like Thane, Mumbai and Navi Mumbai.

Property Rates in and Unit Size

Type Carpet Area Price 1 BHK 379 sq. ft ₹ 34.00 L 1 BHK 476 sq. ft ₹ 43.00 L 2 BHK 672 sq. ft ₹ 59.00 L

Swaminarayan City

Swaminarayan City is one of the best residential projects in Dombivali West. Projects offer 6 % price appreciation in the last year. It is spread over 10 acres of ground having high-rising towers.

The project besides the river promenade offers lifestyle amenities to entertain and provide you with a quality living experience. The project completion is in 2026.

Why Swaminarayan City

An artistically designed housing project having a river view.

Apartments with modern structures are spacious ones.

6% price appreciation in last 1 yr.

All the social institutions are nearby in the vicinity.

Connectivity

The project has upcoming Metro line 12 proximity and roadway connectivity to Navi Mumbai International Airport.

Property Rates in and Unit Size

Type Carpet Area Price 1 BHK 386 sq. ft ₹ 38.50 L 1 BHK 511 sq. ft ₹ 52.00 L 2 BHK 715 sq. ft ₹ 73.00 L 3 BHK 1070 sq. ft ₹ 1.05 Cr
